alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Douglas; Ozark; Stone; Taney; Texas; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...GUSTY OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN OZARK...SOUTHEASTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHERN WRIGHT...DOUGLAS...TANEY...CHRISTIAN...CENTRAL STONE...SOUTHWESTERN TEXAS AND EAST CENTRAL BARRY COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM CDT... At 1009 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Seymour to near Highlandville to 6 miles northeast of Cassville. Movement was east at 40 mph. Gusty winds will occur along and behind this boundary. Some thunderstorms will also trail the outflow boundary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock Lake, Bryant Creek State Park, Table Rock State Park, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Mountain Grove, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Ava, Kimberling City, Forsyth, Cabool, Seymour, Merriam Woods, Sparta, Mansfield, Kissee Mills, Reeds Spring and Highlandville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
